issue.title: [JS] Run Lerna directly instead of via npx
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12271](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12271). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Npx can install lerna but a user may not use the right version. Instead, we should call `yarn lerna`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12271?focusedCommentId=17317416) by Paul Taylor (paul.e.taylor):*
`npx lerna` uses the version of lerna installed in the project's `node_modules` bin dir.
